title: Best of The Program | Guests: Rep. Chris Stewart & Johnnie Moore | 8/19/21
description:
Rep. Chris Stewart joins to discuss American's abysmal actions in Afghanistan and President Biden’s horrible defense. Glenn goes on a rant about America’s cowardice regarding Afghanistan. Rev. Johnnie Moore joins to share the dire circumstances Afghan Christians are currently facing.
